descriptionHTML:
Qibla Wear is one of the first Android wear application that helps Muslims around the world finding the direction of Qibla / Kaaba (القبلة / الكعبة) .

Features:
- Find Qibla Direction easily by your android wear smart watch.
- Automatically detects your location.
- Rotate the arrow to the direction of Qibla / Kaaba.
